page.title: 01REVIEW:BADINGHAM/DENNINGTON
page.content: The block is mainly arable farm land plus the main population centres of the villages of Badingham & Dennington,about 200 houses in all.In l98l populations were Badingham 378,Dennington 433,an apparent 7% decline since l97l probably due to increased armed forces intake not included in census. Many new houses have been built recently. Dennington is a relatively compact village with a primary school, public bus service & playing field.Badingham is scattered and has none of these amenities.In other respects the villages are similar except that Dennington has more local authority housing. Omitting USAF occupants,l89 questionnaires were distributed to households & ll8 replies comprising 323 individuals received (62%). The following pages analyse these replies.
